H0.text: In the Sherlock Holmes stories who was Moriarty’s second in command. Inspector Lestrade

H1.text: In the Sherlock Holmes stories who was Moriarty’s second in command. Mycroft Holmes

H2.text: In the Sherlock Holmes stories who was Moriarty’s second in command. Irene Adler

H3.text: In the Sherlock Holmes stories who was Moriarty’s second in command. Colonel Moran

A4.text: Moriarty's right-hand man in Silver Blaze

A5.text: Moran is portrayed as the inheritor of Moriarty's criminal empire
